title: Tuesday’s $70 million Lotto Max jackpot claimed by single ticket sold in Ontario - Global News
content:
TORONTO — Someone in Ontario is waking up $70 million dollars richer.
A single winning ticket was drawn for Tuesday’s Lotto Max jackpot.

description: Two young emergency room doctors, raised and trained in Montreal, are leaving their jobs after only two years to move back to Toronto – and they say the Quebec health-care model and Bill 96 are to blame.
title: Montreal is losing two ER doctors to Toronto, faulting workload and Bill 96 - CTV News Montreal
content: Two young emergency room doctors, raised and trained in Montreal, are leaving their jobs after only two years to move back to Toronto and they say the Quebec health-care model and Bill 96 are to blam… [+9577 chars]

author: awallace@insider.com (Abby Wallace)
description: The dog's owner was told by airport staff to go home and call the airline after Winston didn't emerge from the plane.
title: A dog was left 'traumatized' after being stranded among lost luggage at Canada's busiest airport for 21 hours amid aviation baggage chaos
content:
A dog was left stranded alongside lost baggage at Toronto Pearson International Airport for over 20 hours, the Canadian news outlet CTV News reported.

description: Canada's main stock market tumbled back into correction territory on Monday and the dollar weakened against its U.S. counterpart as investors raised bets on how high central banks would lift interest rates to tackle inflation.
title: Canadian stocks re-enter correction territory amid rate hike nerves - Reuters.com
